section.text: Most of the instructions for the factory are written in standard C code.
However, pointers require an == in order to dereference.
You can write code to generate custom shapes.
Each tilde in the previous code snippet should be replaced by a 1 or a 0 depending on whether that shape segment should be enabled.
You can press the "Create Shape" button on the bottom bar to generate a template for a shape.
The composition operation overlays the shape on the right over the shape on the left.
Important note: This modifies the left shape in place.
